biotools.summary: It looks for a target site duplication, a polyA in 3′ and an endonuclease cleavage site in 5′ to calculate an overall score of retrotransposition. The tool will be useful for indepth analysis of non-autonomous retrotransposons in sequenced mammals to help us understand retrotransosition in our evolutionary tree.

bioschemas.name: RTanalyzer
bioschemas.summary: It looks for a target site duplication, a polyA in 3′ and an endonuclease cleavage site in 5′ to calculate an overall score of retrotransposition. The tool will be useful for indepth analysis of non-autonomous retrotransposons in sequenced mammals to help us understand retrotransosition in our evolutionary tree.
